content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find this apartment to be a great investment. What price were you thinking of offering for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Based on the market value and the facilities provided, I was thinking of 800 euros a month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but that's not nearly enough for an apartment of this quality in the city center. Don't you think you can offer a bit more?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment and the lack of appliances, I can offer 850 euros a month.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Still, the location alone is worth more than that. How about we meet in the middle? 950 euros a month would be a fair deal for both of us.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a significant increase. I'm willing to pay 900 euros a month, considering the unfurnished state and the lack of appliances.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I can't accept that. The location and the new construction make this apartment highly desirable. 950 euros is the absolute minimum I'm willing to accept.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. I'm willing to pay 925 euros a month. I hope that this offer will be satisfactory for you.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but I must insist on 950 euros a month. This is a fair price for both parties, considering the value of the property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [950] Euro!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Perfect! I'm delighted to have you as a tenant. The contract will be drawn up accordingly. Thank you for your time, Max. I'm sure we'll have a fruitful relationship. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
